hero.title: Digital QR Menu
hero.subtitle: for Modern Cafes
hero.description: Create stunning digital menus with QR codes, organize products by categories, and deliver an exceptional mobile dining experience that your customers will love.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Cafes
features.subtitle: Transform your cafe with our all-in-one platform. Generate QR codes instantly, manage your entire menu effortlessly, and push updates in real-time. Everything you need to go digital, simplified.

qrGeneration.title: QR Code Generation
qrGeneration.description: Generate QR codes for each cafe with preview and PDF export capabilities. Share your digital menu instantly.

menuManagement.title: Complete Menu Management
menuManagement.description: Create, edit, and manage your entire menu structure effortlessly. Add cafes, organize categories, and showcase products with intuitive drag-and-drop organization.

mediaManagement.title: Media Management
mediaManagement.description: Upload and manage cafe logos and product images with secure cloud storage. Show off your dishes with high-quality visuals.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First Experience
mobileFirst.description: Responsive design optimized for mobile devices. Your customers get a seamless experience on any screen size.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrency.description: Support for different currencies across cafes. Perfect for international businesses or franchises.

cafeFocused.title: Cafe-Focused Features
cafeFocused.description: Designed specifically for cafes and restaurants with industry-specific workflows and optimizations.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Cafe?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of cafes already using QR Cafe to create beautiful digital menus. Start your free trial today and see the difference in minutes.

footer.description: Transforming cafes with smart QR menu solutions.
